entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High zero.
